LanguageData.TM_GiantSkeletonR.label: Giant skeleton
LanguageData.TM_GiantSkeletonR.description: An enormous skeleton; this abomination was either created from the bones of a giant creature or by combining the bones of lesser creatures. This skeleton is animated by necromancy and embodied by a vengeful spirit that has wandered the world for ages - long enough to develop a simple, single-minded hate for life.
LanguageData.TM_GiantSkeletonR.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.TM_GiantSkeletonR.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.TM_GiantSkeletonR.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonR.label: Skeleton
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonR.description: Physical husks of creatures raised through the power of necromancy; their sole instinct is to obey their master and destroy all life.
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonR.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonR.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonR.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonLichR.label: skeleton lich
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonLichR.description: The withered and faded bones of an ancient lich embodied by the spirit of malevolence and hatred; whoever, or whatever, this being once was is no more; its sole purpose is to destroy all life and replace it with undeath.
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonLichR.tools.0.label: left hand
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonLichR.tools.1.label: right hand
LanguageData.TM_SkeletonLichR.tools.2.label: death stare
